AUTHOR: De Joker
INSTALL_MSG:
Thank you for installing my repository!
Please send me request/idea for new cogs and features that you want to have!
Any bugreports can be submitted in my repository page and are fully welcome!
NAME: DeJokerCogs
SHORT: Essential tools for moderating your guild.
DESCRIPTION: DeJokerCogs gives you reliable tools to work with and make sure nothing is being made without your watch. All of the cogs are fully customizable only for you.
